item.title: FreePad Zigbee remote
item.description: Freepad Freepad is an open source Zigbee remote intended to be used to have a customizable keypad to control your smart home devices. Read more here: https://modkam.ru/?p=1264 Features list: Single/double/tripple/quadriple/many_x/hold&release Touchlink reset ONOFF bind Level control bind Bindings configuration Remote reset How to join: Press and hold first button for 3-10 seconds(depends whter or not device is on a network), until device start flashing led Wait, in case of successfull join, device will flash led 5 times If join failed, device will flash led 3 times How to use touch link Deprecated due to memory issues, you can use FREEPAD_ENABLE_TL macros if you want to compile with TL functionality

item.title: LeTV Zigbee remote
item.description: Some time ago, digging TaoBao, I’ve found an interesting miniature ZigBee remote control keypad with eight buttons. As this device is powered by a CC2530 chip, an idea appeared in my head to flash it with a great freepad firmware, which was used in my previous remote controls. UPD: This keypad has appeared on Aliexpress Keypad has 8 buttons, two-colored led, and is powered by CR2032 lithium cell. It is quite easy to disassemble this device.
